impositionOffenceDetails.details:
FIDICI - Fined and detained in default of payment until court rises
To be detained in the courthouse . Detention deemed served by reason of time already spent in custody. Total amount enforced £100.00.
FO - Fine
Fined £40.00
PDATE - Pay by date
Pay by date. Date to pay in full by: 11/11/2025.

subject: WRITE OFF ONE DAY DEEMED SERVED
